name: wunres
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cres(c0, c1), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cres(c0, c1), c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cres(c0, c1), c0))
-| wss(cres(c0, c1), c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wss(cres(c0, c1), c0)

|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))

comment: A weak universe is closed under restrictions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2017.)
